page.title: 13Local News. June, 1985.
page.content: Points raised at the Parish Council Meeting include;car parking,proposed scout hut and village hall,proposed bypass for traffic,vandalised bus shelter.Young members of the youth club damaged the pavilion when they heard that it was closing down for the want of a youth leader.Current house prices range from Â£33,500 to Â£64,000. Staff at the Ferry Boat Inn claimed they have seen the 900 years old ghost that is supposed to haunt the inn. Village organisations have been very active.They include; music,winemaking, 'Pop In'house,horticulture,gymkhana, soccer,'Over 60's and Mencap. The annual village festival was held at the church and raised Â£750. Village school news:_Sponsered silence (Â£583),H.S.A.Summer Fayre(Â£760),the retiring Head Teacher made a farewell appearance at the school Folk Evening.
